a machine readable transcription

availability.p: The text of the original item is in the public domain. Permission to reproduce the graphic images of the original item has been granted by the owners of the original for this publication only.

notesStmt.note: The manuscript leaf is mounted on a backing sheet, making the verso inaccessible.

This manuscript was likely composed during May or June 1863. William E. Vandemark (Whitman sometimes spelled it "Vandermark") was wounded on May 3, 1863 during the battle of Chancellorsville and would have been hospitalized in Washington during this time.
The following are responsible for particular readings or for changes to this file, as noted: Elizabeth Lorang Ashley Lawson Tim Jackson
